title: Judge blocks U.S. officials from tech contacts in First Amendment case
description: The Trump-appointed judge’s move could upend years of efforts to enhance coordination between the government and social media companies.

title: Affirmative action ruling could be a blow to diversity in tech
description: The tech industry, which has already struggled with diversity, could become more homogeneous in the wake of the Supreme Court's decision on affirmative action.

title: A viral left-wing Twitter account may have been fake all along
description: For months, the Erica Marsh account had raised suspicions among online misinformation experts due to her lack of a real-world footprint and her devotion to attention-grabbing viewpoints one called “cartoonishly liberal.”

title: Meta takes on Twitter with rival Threads app
description: As Elon Musk's Twitter unveils unpopular new changes, Meta's Instagram announced a new app that shares many of its features. It will be available for download on Thursday.

title: Truth Social’s merger partner offers $18 million in settlement to SEC
description: The settlement, which is subject to approval by the SEC, could help unlock hundreds of millions of dollars for Trump’s media company.
